duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage receivable discount program for a specific portfolio of Scoular’s customers.
Research contracts and invoices in the main trade application.
Prepare and maintain necessary bank reconciliations for Scoular and its subsidiaries.
Book journal entries in selected areas and apply/clear all drafts presented for payment.
Process payables and send out daily communications to the corporate accounting and finance groups.
Play a key role in testing and implementing the cash disbursement process within Scoular’s IT financial management software project.
Perform daily reconciliations for the main operating and certain subsidiary bank accounts.
Prepare the monthly cash reconciliations for all outlying location banks.
Perform recordkeeping and booking journal entries for selected corporate service areas.
Clear items in the subledger and review all drafts sent daily from the bank. Also assist employees company-wide on an as-needed basis.
Perform testing and aid in the integration of the IT transformation project with respect to the cash disbursement process.
Enter and calculate daily and monthly FX rates as a backup role.
Complete daily Futures Hedging Maintenance Requirement reconciliations and entries to the subledger system.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or Business (Master's preferred)
